scripts.setup: npm i && cd infra && npm i && cd ..
scripts.cdk:bootstrap: set -e; ACCOUNT_ID=$(aws sts get-caller-identity --query Account --output text); if [ -z "$ACCOUNT_ID" ]; then echo 'No AWS account id. Set AWS_PROFILE or login.' && exit 1; fi; REGION=${AWS_REGION:-eu-central-1}; export CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT=$ACCOUNT_ID; export CDK_DEFAULT_REGION=$REGION; cd infra && npx cdk bootstrap aws://$CDK_DEFAULT_ACCOUNT/$CDK_DEFAULT_REGION
scripts.cdk:deploy: cd infra && npx cdk deploy --require-approval never
scripts.bench: npm run build && npm run cdk:deploy && node --loader ts-node/esm bench/orchestrator.ts
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist .cdk.out infra/cdk-outputs.json reports && find . -name 'node_modules' -maxdepth 2 -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} +
